Room.Name: Campus Walk East
Room.ShortDescription: This is the eastern entrance to campus.
Room.LongDescription: To the west is the main Quad for the campus, and to the north you can see the Randiforth Systems building. Randiforth Systems provides offices, labs, and classrooms for the engineering school. You can see to the south a large building that is the student union for all of campus. To the east is main street and the rest of Celduin.
